name: SE-Post-URL-Dump
tagline: Lists URLs for all posts you have across SE
body:
### Welcome
This script will give you a list of all the posts you have made across the Stack Exchange Network

### Usage
Get an access token, by clicking [this link](https://stackexchange.com/oauth/dialog?client_id=6024&redirect_url=https://stackexchange.com/oauth/login_success). You'll get something like:

>https://stackexchange.com/oauth/login_success#access_token=asda89223***32nsd8())&expires=86399

Copy and paste the thing between `access_token=` and `&`, ie. `asda89223***32nsd8())`.

Access token:

Account ID:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
